SearchForWindow(string, string)

Finds a Window based on a string. Supports partial matches.

public static nint SearchForWindow(string wndclass, string title)

Parameters

wndclass string

The wndclass to use in the search

title string

The search string to match

Returns

nint

An IntPtr to the window if a match is found, otherwise null
